item.title: Kimi add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only good thing to do with good advice is pass it on; it is never of any use to oneself." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Ben Stein
item.description: "The first step to getting the tings you want out of life is this: Decide what you want." -- Ben Stein

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "Boys will be boys. And even that wouldn't matter if only we could prevent girls from being girls." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Eric Hoffer
item.description: "Compassion is the antitoxin of the soul: where there is compassion even the most poisonous impulses remain relatively harmless." -- Eric Hoffer

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus
